short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes common USA ingredient names to their UK equivalents.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will switch out some commonly used words in recipes in the USA - i.e. cilantro ('coriander' in the UK).

Might be useful for some people - especially if you weren't aware of some of the alternates and spend time wondering if you have arugula in your cupboard! (it's 'rocket' salad..)

Have fun. Send me any requests for extra words to add - @willohara on twitter
